body: compiler/compilation-dependencies.cc:CompilationDependencies::DependOnNoUndetectableObjectsProtector registers a ProtectorDependency on the factory's no_undetectable_objects_protector property cell. The implementation calls DependOnProtector with MakeRef(broker_, broker_->isolate()->factory()->no_undetectable_objects_protector()) and returns bool. The ProtectorDependency records the PropertyCellRef and checks cell->value() == Protectors::kProtectorValid in IsValid, and Install registers the PropertyCell handle with DependentCode::kPropertyCellChangedGroup. This is the central place where protector-based assumptions are attached to compilation dependencies.
explanation: Explains how CompilationDependencies records a dependency on NoUndetectableObjects protector and what that implies for installation and validation.
